'''Angelo Montanini''' (b. [[21 May]] [[1951]]<ref name=CCGA>{{CCGA|entry=Angelo Montanini}}, p. 192</ref>) is an Italian [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-inspired artist. 

==Career==
While he had been an artist before, Montanini attributes his focus on fantasy art to [[Angus McBride]]. He began working for Stratelibri, an Italian games publishing house in [[1993]], even serving as its art director until [[1999]]. The company's founder, Giovanni Ingellis, recommended Montanini to [[Iron Crown Enterprises]]. This led to him creating over one hundred illustrations for their games. He also created calendar illustrations for the [[Italian Tolkien Society]].<ref name=CCGA/>

Montanini taught drawing and illustration in the European Fashion School of Milan.<ref>''[[CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter]]'' #5 ([[August]], [[1999]])</ref>
